metadata.name: New Kind of Network (NKN) Detection
metadata.comment: NKN is a networking service using blockchain technology to support a decentralized network of peers. While there are legitimate uses for it, it can also be used as a C2 channel. This rule looks for a DNS request to the ma>

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM dns_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('seed')) AND contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('.nkn.org')))

metadata.objective: Examine fields: id.orig_h, id.resp_h, answers.rdata False positive: Unknown References: https://github.com/nknorg/nkn-sdk-go, https://unit42.paloaltonetworks.com/manageengine-godzilla-nglite-kdcsponge/, https://github.com/Maka8ka/NGLite
